meanings.definition: A diverse group of single-celled organisms that are typically microscopic and have complex cellular structures.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the protozoa looked like tiny, busy cities.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protozoa to learn more about microscopic life forms.
meanings.sent3: The protozoa threw a microscopic party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of single-celled organisms, protozoa are the architects.
meanings.sent5: The complex cellular structures of protozoa are like miniature mazes.

meanings.definition: Any member of the phylum Protozoa, including amoebas, flagellates, ciliates, and sporozoans.
meanings.sent1: The pond water was teeming with various protozoa, from amoebas to flagellates.
meanings.sent2: Protozoa such as ciliates play important roles in aquatic ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The amoeba and the flagellate protozoa had a race under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: In the microscopic world, protozoa are the diverse stars of the show.
meanings.sent5: The sporozoans among the protozoa were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
